BasicInfo.short: Your Key to the World - Security that doesn't get in the way SSO, 2FA, MFA, Endpoint Access, App Authorization, Password Manager in One.

Products.name: SAASPASS Proximity Login Plugin with 2FA / MFA
Products.description: Proximity Login Plugin that allows authorized users to login to enabled sites with proximity 2FA / MFA running silently in the background

Products.name: SAASPASS Secure Single Sign On Agent
Products.description: Secure Single Sign On agent with integrated Proximity and 2FA / MFA

Products.name: SAASPASS Computer Connector
Products.description: SAASPASS Computer Connector enforces 2FA at login on Macs, Windows & Linux machines with an integrated Single Sign On agent

Products.name: SAASPASS Client
Products.description: The SAASPASS Client is the master key that allows a user to interact and authenticate to the SAASPASS Computer Connectors, Websites and IoT
